config:
Exportar documento excel directo al browser
false
dinamica.GenericTransaction false false false <recordset id="query-logo scale="60" url="/images/logo-simone-pdf.sql" source="session" scope="transaction" />
domain.ExcelReportOutput
<title cellPosY="1" cellPosX="4" cellStep="0" name="${lbl:${lblb_outsourced_subsidiaries}"/>
<excel recordset='query-logo scale="60" url="/images/logo-simone-pdf.sql' sheetname='${lbl:${lblb_outsourced_subsidiaries}' filename='${lbl:${lblb_outsourced_subsidiaries}.xls' date-format='dd-MM-yyyy' header-background='true'>
